unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a 'Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge' Style Boost – But for Cars, Not Kajol!**
normalised: e v Charging Gets a 'Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge' Style Boost – But for Cars, Not Kajol!

unnormalised: Hey auto enthusiasts! Remember Raj rescuing Simran near the fields? Well, now imagine him plugging in his electric car instead of hopping onto a train! EV charging is getting a major makeover, folks.
normalised: Hey auto enthusiasts! Remember Raj rescuing Simran near the fields? Well, now imagine him plugging in his electric car instead of hopping onto a train! e v charging is getting a major makeover, folks.

unnormalised: IIT Madras just unveiled a new fast-charging tech that could juice up your Tata Nexon EV in, like, half the time! No more chai breaks stretching into eternity while you wait for a full charge.
normalised: I I T Madras just unveiled a new fast-charging tech that could juice up your Tata Nexon e v in, like, half the time! No more chai breaks stretching into eternity while you wait for a full charge.

unnormalised: Talking about infrastructure, the Karnataka government is planning to install hundreds of new charging stations along the Bangalore-Mysore highway. Imagine cruising smoothly, knowing you're never too far from a top-up.
normalised: Talking about infrastructure, the Karnataka government is planning to install hundreds of new charging stations along the Bangalore-Mysore highway. Imagine cruising smoothly, knowing you're never too far from a top-up.

unnormalised: And get this: Bharat Petroleum is teaming up with startups to bring even more innovative charging solutions to tier-2 cities. So, soon even a remote village in Rajasthan might have a charging point!
normalised: And get this: Bharat Petroleum is teaming up with startups to bring even more innovative charging solutions to tier-two cities. So, soon even a remote village in Rajasthan might have a charging point!

unnormalised: Plus, companies are working on battery swapping tech. Just swap your depleted battery for a fully charged one in minutes – quicker than getting a vada pav at a local stall!
normalised: Plus, companies are working on battery swapping tech. Just swap your depleted battery for a fully charged one in minutes – quicker than getting a vada pav at a local stall!

unnormalised: The future looks bright for EV owners in India. No more range anxiety, just smooth, emission-free driving. Aage aage dekho, hota hai kya!
normalised: The future looks bright for e v owners in India. No more range anxiety, just smooth, emission-free driving. Aage aage dekho, hota hai kya!
